messages.content: Eh what you doing now?
Scrolling TikTok lor, nothing much. You leh? Donâ€™t pretend busy ğŸ˜‚
Wah so free ah?
Aiyo, got free time must enjoy mah. Later busy then cry also no use.
You always like that one.
Haha donâ€™t expose me leh, I shy liao ğŸ˜³
Shy still post dance video?
That one different okay, got filter confidence ğŸ˜Œ
You eat already or not?
Not yet leh, I lazy go downstairs buy.
Order grab la so easy.
You think I made of money ah ğŸ˜¤
Then I treat lor.
Wah suddenly so nice, got motive hor?
No la, just being friendly.
Mmm okay la, I pretend believe you ğŸ˜
You play games one ah?
Casual only leh, mostly mobile games. Why? Wanna jio me issit?
Ya lor, I carry you.
You carry or I carry you later donâ€™t cry ah ğŸ˜‚
So confident sia.
Hehe must act pro first mah. Later lose then run away.
Ok ok we try tonight.
Deal. Donâ€™t pangseh me hor.
What music you listening to now?
A bit emo oneâ€¦ Jay Chou playlist haha.
Why emo sia, who hurt you?
Nobody la, just rainy day mood only.
Aiyo drama queen.
Eh donâ€™t bully me leh, I just vibe only.
Ok ok I send you happy song later.
Better be good one ah, I got high standard ğŸ˜Œ
You watch K-drama or not?
Of course la, I not alien okay ğŸ˜¤
Which one you watching now?
â€˜My Demonâ€™ leh, the main guy so handsome I cannot ğŸ˜­
So you like bad boys ah.
Haha maybe... but only in drama la. Real life too tiring.
Ok la I cancel my tattoo appointment.
You ah, so lame ğŸ˜‚ but not bad, got effort.
You got gym one meh?
Now and then lor, mostly for fun. Not hardcore like you lah.
I never say I gym sia.
Huh then your profile pic bluff me is it ğŸ˜¤
Muscle shirt only, got trick effect.
Wah catfish 101 sia ğŸ˜‚ I sue you ah.
Donâ€™t need gym if got good heart right?
Chehâ€¦ smooth sia. You rehearse one or what?
Eh you like bubble tea right?
Of course la, I basic but proud ğŸ˜
Then whatâ€™s your go-to order?
Oolong milk tea, 25% sugar, less ice, pearls must be soft okay.
Wah so specific one.
Hello, BBT is serious business leh.
Next time I buy for you.
You say one hor. I remember de ğŸ˜Œ
You always take selfies one ah?
Haha not always la, only when I feel cute ğŸ˜
Then you must take a lot.
Aiyo why you like this ah ğŸ˜‚
I just saying the truth mah.
Okay lor, I accept the compliment... shy a bit hehe.
Send one can?
Cannot la, later you use it for wallpaper I paiseh.
What you usually do during weekend?
Usually nua at home lor, sometimes go cafe with friends.
Wah atas lifestyle.
No la, cafe just for the aesthetic hehe.
Then got take pics for IG or not?
Of course. Go cafe never post is like never go.
Influencer mindset sia.
Pls lor, my followers only my dog and my mum ğŸ˜‚
Eh your accent got ang moh one leh.
Eh where got! I just pronounce properly only ğŸ˜¤
You sure you never study overseas?
Never la, I just watch too much Netflix can? ğŸ˜…
Okay okay I believe... for now.
You better hor. Donâ€™t test me hehe.
Later talk to you must also switch accent liao.
Can, but must pay consultation fee ğŸ˜Œ
How come you always reply so slow one?
Aiyo I not robot leh, I also got life okay ğŸ˜¤
But you always online what.
Online doesnâ€™t mean free lor. Sometimes just zoning out only.
Zoning out from me ah? So pain sia.
Aiya donâ€™t act hurt lah, I reply you liao right ğŸ˜
You prefer cats or dogs?
I like both leh, but cats more drama like me ğŸ˜†
You drama meh?
I lowkey drama queen but cute type okay.
Then I dog lor, must tahan you.
Hehe then you must be loyal and fluffy ğŸ¶
You got go Zouk before or not?
Got lah, but not every week okay. I not party animal.
So go club for what?
Vibes lor. Music, friends, dance a bit. Not everything is about chionging guys hor ğŸ˜¤
I never say that leh.
I know your type one. Donâ€™t act innocent ah ğŸ˜
Your handwriting nice or not?
Depends laâ€¦ some days like calligraphy, some days like chicken scratch ğŸ”
So got mood one ah.
Yah lor, like my eyeliner. Got good day, got bad day.
Then must see your good day handwriting liao.
I write you letter next time, if I donâ€™t forget hehe.
What you scared of the most?
Cockroach that can fly ğŸ˜­
Wah same sia. Those got wings one worse.
Confirm. Got wings means they got confidence also ğŸ˜¤
So if see one in your room then how?
I scream first, then run, then text someone to come save me ğŸ˜‚
You believe in horoscopes?
Sometimes lahâ€¦ especially when it say good things about me hehe âœ¨
Whatâ€™s your sign then?
Iâ€™m Leo. So yes, I like attention but pretend I donâ€™t ğŸ¤­
Wah confirm drama queen.
Excuse me, Iâ€™m regal okay. Not dramaâ€”just expressive ğŸ˜Œ
What food you always crave?
McSpicy. Rain or shine also will think of it leh.
You can tank spice meh?
A bit only. Eat halfway nose run, but still shiok ğŸ˜­
Respect. I one bite already cry.
Hehe I brave one okay. But ice milo must standby.
Your room messy or neat?
Depends who asking lor. If mum ask, confirm neat ğŸ˜‡
Then me leh?
Hmmâ€¦ for you I say 50/50 la. Got messy aesthetic vibes ğŸ˜‚
So you got â€˜organised chaosâ€™ issit.
Exactly. I know where everything isâ€¦ even if it looks lost.
If I challenge you to karaoke, you dare or not?
Can ah. But I warn you, I sing until window break one ğŸ˜‚
That one I must hear.
Your ears might regret but your heart will be impressed.
What song you confirm sing?
Jay Chou â€“ Qing Tian. Classic must flex.
Why girls take so long to get ready ah?
Because perfection takes time ok ğŸ˜¤
So you calling yourself perfect?
Haha no la, but at least 80% there.
Not bad, got confidence.
Must fake it till you make it mah ğŸ˜Œ
You more introvert or extrovert?
I think ambivert leh. Got mood one. Sometimes I social butterfly, sometimes I hide like hermit crab ğŸ¦€
So which one you now?
Now? Slightly antisocial but still reply you la, feel honoured ok ğŸ˜‚
Wah thanks for the honour.
You're welcome, your majesty ğŸ˜Œ
You believe in love at first sight?
Haha I believe in love at first *vibe* more.
So looks donâ€™t matter?
Look nice is bonus la. But if got good energy, that one more shiok.
Then I must work on my vibes.
Yes please. First impression must come with aura one ğŸ˜Œ
You scared of horror movies?
YES. I scream louder than the ghost ğŸ˜­
Still watch or not?
Only if got someone beside me to protect haha. Otherwise I confirm cover face the whole time.
I volunteer as tribute.
Wah ok, but you better donâ€™t scream louder than me ah.
Your ideal first date is?
Hmmâ€¦ maybe simple dinner then long walk. Donâ€™t need atas, just got vibe can already.
So picnic can?
Yes! As long as got fairy lights or cute snacks, I approve âœ¨
I bring teh peng and curry puff can?
Haha very Singaporean but I accept la. Teh peng got my heart.
If you can fly anywhere now, where you go?
Japan leh. I want eat sushi, see sakura, wear kimono ğŸ˜
Wah got whole itinerary already.
Of course. I planner type okay. My Google Maps full of stars.
Then next time I follow you plan.
Sure. But must help me take nice pics hor ğŸ“¸
You got childhood nickname or not?
Got lehâ€¦ my relatives call me Ah Girl ğŸ™„
Still call now or not?
Sadly yes. I 20+ already still â€˜Ah Girlâ€™... no upgrade sia.
Cute what.
You laugh somemore I call you Ah Boy ah ğŸ˜¤
How you deal with bad days?
Buy bubble tea, lie in bed, scroll memes. Sometimes cry a bit also ğŸ˜…
Must cry then shiok ah?
Cry then can reset mah. After that become strong again.
Okay la fair. Want me send meme next time?
Can! Bonus if the meme is lame but cute ğŸ˜‚
You got piercings or not?
Ears only leh. I not fierce enough for anything else haha.
But ear how many?
Just two. One each side. I very guai one okay ğŸ˜‡
I expected more leh.
Next time I add more then scare you ğŸ˜ˆ
You ever kena scolded in public before?
Yes omg, once my mum scolded me at NTUC cos I drop eggs ğŸ˜­
Wah malu sia.
Super malu. I just stare at the floor and pretend Iâ€™m invisible.
Next time wear disguise go grocery shopping.
Yah wear shades and hoodie like undercover agent ğŸ˜‚
You ever kena detention in school?
Only onceâ€¦ cos I late too many times ğŸ˜…
Wah naughty sia.
Not naughty la, just bad relationship with alarm clock.
You need someone to wake you up.
Volunteer lah. But donâ€™t call me before 10am hor ğŸ˜¤
You ever kena ghosted before?
Ya lor, one guy suddenly disappear like magician ğŸ¥²
Wah that guy donâ€™t know what he missing.
Aiyo you sweet talk now, later run away also I cry ah.
I stay one, I promise.
Ok lorâ€¦ I give you probation period first ğŸ˜‚
Whatâ€™s your guilty pleasure show?
Got a fewâ€¦ but 'Keeping Up with the Kardashians' confirm inside ğŸ˜³
Wah drama max.
Ya lor, sometimes I watch and feel like my life not messy enough.
Then must create drama liao.
Eh no need lah, I like peace with popcorn ğŸ˜Œ
You believe in fate or not?
Sometimes leh. Like some things just feel too perfect to be coincidence.
So we talking now is fate ah?
Haha maybe lorâ€¦ or maybe you just slid into my DMs at the right time.
Eh donâ€™t expose me like that.
Too late ğŸ˜ but nvm, I reply means you pass the vibe check.
How many selfies you take before posting one?
Honestly... maybe 30? Then edit until nice lor ğŸ˜…
Wah effort sia.
Must maintain image mah. Instagram is war zone okay.
So your real face same as IG one or not?
Similar laâ€¦ just got extra filter confidence on IG ğŸ˜‚
You prefer east side or west side?
East side best side duh ğŸŒŠ
Why so biased?
Got beach, got vibes, got nice food. West side only got... Jurong Bird Park last time ğŸ˜‚
Eh donâ€™t diss west like that.
Okay okay, peace la. Every MRT line got its own charm.
Do you cry during sad movies?
Yes lehâ€¦ I cry even at touching commercials ğŸ˜­
Wah emotional sia.
What to do, I got soft heart. Especially if got dog or grandma inside confirm cry.
Need tissue next time liao.
You bring I hold your arm can ğŸ˜³
Whatâ€™s your ideal holiday?
Somewhere chillâ€¦ like beach resort, wake up late, eat buffet.
You donâ€™t like hiking type ah?
I hike in malls can. Nature I admire from photo ğŸ˜‚
Wah confirm need spa also.
Yesss. Spa, bubble bath, then sleep 10 hours. Best life.
You ever kena caught sleeping in class?
Got lor. One time teacher call my name I answer wrong subject ğŸ«
Legend sia.
I blur but at least I cute right ğŸ˜‚
Okay okay I let you off.
Next time I sit beside you so you wake me hor.
Do you prefer text or call?
Text easier la. Call sometimes I panic and forget how to talk.
So shy meh?
Not shy la, just need warm-up. After 5 mins then can talk non-stop ğŸ˜†
Then next time I text first.
Deal. Later become midnight texting kakis.
Whatâ€™s your biggest ick?
When people chew loudly or cut queue ğŸ˜¤
So if I cut queue you wonâ€™t talk to me liao?
Iâ€™ll scold you first then forgiveâ€¦ maybe ğŸ˜
So fierce sia.
Fierce but fair. Iâ€™m cute but got standards hor.
You ever kena catcalled before?
Yaâ€¦ super uncomfortable lor. Just want to disappear sia ğŸ˜¤
You okay anot?
Ya la, now I just ignore. But still not nice leh, donâ€™t anyhow shout at people.
Next time I be your bodyguard.
Haha can. Must be garang one hor ğŸ’ª
How do you usually celebrate your birthday?
Small gathering with friends, cake, maybe karaoke. Nothing too big la.
Wah no chalet party ah?
Haha last time poly got la. Now old already, just want chill.
So this year how?
This year? Got you wish me can already hehe ğŸ‚
Do you usually make the first move?
Depends leh. If I really like then maybe drop hints first lor.
What kind of hints?
Like suddenly reply fast, ask random questions, pretend I blur when I not.
So now you replying fast... hmm.
Eh donâ€™t think too much la! I just free now only okay ğŸ˜³
How often you shop online?
Too often until my parcel auntie knows my name ğŸ˜…
Wah dangerous sia.
Yah lor. One moment just browse, next moment cart full liao.
Need shopping intervention liao.
Canâ€¦ but you pay for my next cart first ğŸ˜‚
You can cook or not?
Can la, but simple stuff only. Instant noodle master here ğŸ˜Œ
Wah I thought you Gordon Ramsay.
I can be... if maggi is gourmet enough for you ğŸ˜‚
I eat anything you cook one.
Careful what you wish for ah. Later I make experiment dish ğŸ˜
You got dream job or not?
Wah deep questionâ€¦ I think something creative lah. Like design or content stuff.
Influencer considered?
Haha if got people sponsor me bubble tea then I consider ğŸ˜
I sponsor you first can?
Wah potential manager spotted ğŸ˜‚
You still keep your soft toys?
Yes la, my childhood bear still got seat on my bed ğŸ§¸
So cute sia.
Donâ€™t judge me hor. He protect me from nightmares okay.
Okay okay I wonâ€™t fight with him.
Good. Heâ€™s very territorial ğŸ˜‚
What kind of people you cannot stand?
Hmm... maybe arrogant and rude ones lor. Talk like they above everyone.
Then I must act humble liao.
Yes please. Humble with charm = 100 points ğŸ˜Œ
Charm I got. Humbleâ€¦ still downloading.
Walao eh ğŸ¤¦â€â™€ï¸ uninstall your ego first la!
Do you like rainy days?
Yes leh. Rainy days best for blanket, drama, and hot milo ğŸ˜
So cozy sia.
Yah lor. Bonus if got someone to cuddle also la hehe.
Eh hinting something ah?
No la, I talking about my bolster only ğŸ˜³
Whatâ€™s your skincare routine ah?
Haha wah suddenly ask this. Okay I use cleanser, toner, serum, moisturiserâ€¦ and vibes âœ¨
Vibes most important hor.
Confirm. Bad vibes give you breakout one I swear ğŸ˜‚
So I must give you good vibes daily.
Yes please. Be my daily happy serum ğŸ˜Œ
You prefer sunrise or sunset?
Sunset leh. Got chill vibes, and I donâ€™t need to wake up early to see ğŸ˜‚
So romantic hor.
Yah lorâ€¦ if got someone sit beside even better ğŸ˜³
I volunteer again.
Wah you very fast hor. But okay la, I consider ğŸ˜Œ
Whatâ€™s one app you cannot live without?
Probably Telegram. That one got all my gossip groups ğŸ˜†
Wah got secret society inside.
Shhhâ€¦ you expose then I kena removed how?
I join as undercover agent.
Haha okay, but must pass vibe check first hor.
Do you snore when you sleep?
I think no lehâ€¦ but my soft toy never complain before so should be safe ğŸ˜‚
Must install CCTV to confirm.
Eh that one scary sia. Later got ghost walk past how?
Then I come protect you lor.
Wah got free ghostbuster, not bad ah ğŸ˜
Whatâ€™s your favourite hawker food?
Char kway teow leh. Must be extra hum, then shiok.
You one of those hum people huh.
Yes lor. No hum no soul ğŸ˜‚
Later stomach pain donâ€™t cry.
I pain also happy if the kway teow is worth it.
Do you believe in aliens?
Honestlyâ€¦ got chance leh. Universe so big, cannot be only us right?
Then if alien date you how?
Haha if he got BTO and can make me laugh, maybe can consider ğŸ˜†
Wah you high maintenance sia.
No la, just got intergalactic standards ğŸ˜Œ
You scared of injections or not?
Wah yesâ€¦ I will look away, hold breath, pray for it to end fast ğŸ˜­
So dramatic.
You try lor. Needle look like toothpick but pain like heartbreak.
Next time I hold your hand la.
Steady. Just donâ€™t faint before me can already ğŸ˜‚
You ever kena accident before?
Touch wood no ğŸ™ but I fall down escalator once. Damn paiseh.
Got people help or not?
Got auntie say â€˜aiyo girl must be carefulâ€™, then I pretend nothing happen.
If I was there I sure help.
Good lor. Next time I fall, I fall near you.
Do you believe ex can be friends?
Hmmâ€¦ only if both really move on la. Otherwise very messy.
You got still talk to yours?
Nope. I believe in block and heal ğŸ’â€â™€ï¸
Power move sia.
Must protect peace mah. Heart too small for extra drama.
If you kena 1 million dollars, what you do first?
I scream first, then disappear for 1 month ğŸ˜‚
Go where sia?
Somewhere got beach, spa, and no wifi. Total reset.
Can bring me or not?
You bring snacks I consider hehe.
You watch anime or not?
Got leh! Not hardcore but I like romantic or funny ones.
Which one your fav?
Probably 'Your Name'. That one make me cry sia.
Wah emotional movie gang again.
Yes la, I soft girl. But I also can fight if need ğŸ˜¤
Do you believe in zodiac compatibility?
A bit lehâ€¦ sometimes the traits quite accurate sia.
Then what sign you match with?
Iâ€™m Geminiâ€¦ they say I match with Libra or Aries. But hor, I think vibe more important la.
Then I better go check my chart now.
Hahaha better be good match ah, if not I blame the stars ğŸ˜†
Whatâ€™s the most spontaneous thing youâ€™ve done?
Book a flight to Bangkok last minute just because I was bored ğŸ˜‚
Wah serious ah?
Yah lor. I solo travel also can one. Just me and my shopping list.
Steady sia. Next time jio me.
Can, but must help me carry my shopping hor ğŸ˜
Do you sing in the shower?
Of course! Iâ€™m the concert queen when shampoo on my head ğŸ¤
Whatâ€™s your go-to song?
Usually some sad song, act like music video in the rain ğŸ˜‚
Wah got whole drama production.
Hehe ya la, but at least I always hit the high notes (I think).
You more morning or night person?
Confirm night owl. Morning I function at 10% only ğŸ¥±
Then how you go school last time?
Go but soul not present ğŸ˜‚ body only sit there.
Same sia. Morning class = nap time.
Yah lor. Night then I become hyper like caffeine overdose.
You got secret talent or not?
Can sleep anywhere, anytime. Bus, MRT, even noisy kopitiam ğŸ˜´
Wah power. Thatâ€™s not talent, thatâ€™s superpower.
Haha thanks hor. Should put in my CV right?
Confirm. HR will say 'this one stable sleeper'.
Hahaha best compliment ever.
You scared of heights or not?
A bit laâ€¦ if no railing I auto squat down ğŸ˜‚
So you wonâ€™t go skydiving?
Wah cannot leh. I scream before the plane door even open.
I hold your hand can?
You hold both sides I also still cry sia ğŸ˜­
What do you usually do when youâ€™re bored?
Spam TikTok until I realise I wasted 3 hours ğŸ˜‚
Wah relatable.
Right? Then I tell myself 'just 5 mins'â€¦ 5 hours later still there.
Maybe we need TikTok rehab.
Haha too late liao. We both confirmed addicted.
If you could have a superpower, what would it be?
Teleportation! So I donâ€™t need to wait for bus ever again.
You just want skip MRT jam right.
Confirm. Peak hour like sardine can, I cannot sia.
Then you teleport to me next time la.
Haha okay, but bring snacks or I go back ğŸ˜
You more blur or sharp kind?
Outwardly blur, but sometimes secretly sharp hehe.
So act blur live longer ah.
Exactly. Blur until people let their guard down, then I attack with facts ğŸ˜‚
Wah dangerous sia.
Hehe I soft but not weak okay.
What do you wear at home?
Oversized tee and FBT shorts lor. Classic home outfit.
Comfort over fashion ah.
Yah la, who dress up at home? I not filming drama ğŸ˜‚
So you got whole drawer of FBTs?
Almost. Got colours to match mood somemore.
If you win a free staycation, who you bringing?
Wah hard choice siaâ€¦ maybe I just bring my bolster first ğŸ˜‚
Bolster more important than me ah?
Bolster never disappoint me before mah ğŸ˜Œ
I promise to be fluffier.
Haha ok la, you got potential to upgrade my plus-one spot.
You ever kena scammed before?
Almost sia. One time this fake Shopee SMS ask me click link. Lucky I blur but not that blur ğŸ˜¤
Wah close call.
Yah lor. After that I donâ€™t click anything unless 100% got discount one ğŸ˜‚
You scam me into liking you can?
Cheyâ€¦ that one maybe I consider ğŸ˜
Whatâ€™s your fav childhood snack?
Super Ring leh. After eat whole mouth orange ğŸ˜‚
I thought you say Hello Panda.
That one too atas for primary school me. Must save for special occasion.
Now got budget liao, can buy whole box.
Ya la, but eat liao still feel like kid. Nostalgia taste best lor.
Whatâ€™s your screen time per day?
Donâ€™t remind meâ€¦ last week was 8 hours ğŸ«
Wah phone more loyal than your friends sia.
True leh. My phone see my face more than my parents.
Then I must appear on your screen more often.
Haha ok can. I give you your own folder ğŸ˜Œ
Do you believe in giving second chances?
Depends lor. If small mistake then okayâ€¦ but if break trust then quite hard liao.
So no second chance for cheaters?
Confirm no. This one cannot bargain. My heart not discount store hor.
Wah savage but fair.
Hehe I nice until you cross the line. Then I disappear like magic.
Whatâ€™s your love language?
Quality time I think. I like when people really got presence, not just scroll phone beside me.
So must give 100% attention la?
Yah lor. Even if we just nua and talk nonsense, still counts.
Then next time I zip my phone in bag.
Can. I reward you with random shoulder bump ğŸ˜‚
Whatâ€™s one thing you always forget?
Where I put my keys. Every. Single. Time. ğŸ˜©
Need to put AirTag liao.
Yah lor. Or glue to my phone, since that one never lost ğŸ˜‚
Or I help you keep next time.
Can, but I charge storage fee ah hehe.
You prefer spicy or sweet?
Sweet leh. Spicy I eat halfway already cry liao ğŸ˜­
So you sweet girl also la.
Haha you say one hor. I pretend I shy now ğŸ˜³
Not pretend la, you really sweet.
Chehâ€¦ smooth sia. I give 7.5/10 for that line ğŸ˜Œ
What kind of texts make you smile?
The random â€˜I thought of you just nowâ€™ kind. Super wholesome.
Noted. I go prepare one now.
Hehe must be sincere hor. I got radar for fake sweet talk.
Eh I genuine one okay.
Ok la, I trustâ€¦ for now ğŸ˜
You good at directions or always lost?
Tbh I always need Google Maps even in mall ğŸ˜‚
Wah confirm blur.
Blur but cute can or not ğŸ˜¤
Can. I guide you everywhere la.
Okay, GPS boyfriend material unlocked.
Do you prefer gold or silver accessories?
Silver leh. Gold make me feel like ah ma sometimes ğŸ˜…
Then next time I buy silver bracelet for you.
Wah steady ah. Must come with matching vibes also hor.
Of course. Bracelet and boyfriend set.
Aiyo you smooth sia ğŸ˜³
Whatâ€™s your current phone wallpaper?
Itâ€™s a cat sleeping on sushiâ€¦ very random but cute ğŸ˜†
Wah thatâ€™s niche.
Haha I like weirdly cute things lor. Brings me joy.
Next time put my face can?
Haha if you pose like sleeping sushi cat maybe I consider ğŸ˜‚
Whatâ€™s something youâ€™re really picky about?
Food textures leh. Like soggy fries I confirm cannot ğŸ¥²
Wah you food critic ah.
Not critic laâ€¦ just got standards ğŸ˜Œ
So if fries not crispy, return to sender?
Haha I just silently cry inside and never order again lor.
Would you date someone younger?
Depends how much younger leh. 1â€“2 years okay la, but must be mature.
If I younger but act mature can?
Can test first. But if halfway still childish then I run ah ğŸ˜‚
I promise to only be childish 10% of the time.
Haha okay, 90% mature = pass.
Are you more chill or more kanchiong?
Outside chill, inside confirm kanchiong spider ğŸ•·ï¸
Wah so you act calm la.
Yah lor. Must look composed even when dying inside.
Respect. You pro actress.
Hehe thanksâ€¦ next time I act blur also just let me hor.
You scared of being alone?
Not really leh. I enjoy my own companyâ€¦ but sometimes still crave attention la hehe.
So you lowkey clingy?
A bit laâ€¦ but only to the right person ğŸ˜³
Then I better train to be that person.
Ok can. Training starts now ğŸ˜Œ
You more chaotic or organised type?
Chaotic organised. My mess got system one ğŸ˜
So your table messy but you know where everything is?
Exactly. You touch my things then I lost liao.
I touch your heart can?
Wah smooth sia. I pretend to ignore that one ğŸ˜‚
Whatâ€™s your comfort movie?
Probably 'Howlâ€™s Moving Castle'. Got magic, romance, and pretty visuals âœ¨
Wah Ghibli fan ah?
Yah lor. Their vibes very healing one.
Then I sit beside you while you watch can?
Can, but you must quietly enjoy. No talk halfway hor ğŸ˜¤
Are you the jealous type?
